solution_line_template: In one week, he bakes {days_apple_pie} * {pies_per_day} = <<{days_apple_pie}*{pies_per_day}={total_apple_pies}>>{total_apple_pies} apple pies.
In one week, he bakes {days_cherry_pie} * {pies_per_day} = <<{days_cherry_pie}*{pies_per_day}={total_cherry_pies}>>{total_cherry_pies} cherry pies.
